subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Playing with a soft cast protecting his broken left forearm, the junior Tony Pike had one of his finest games, throwing two touchdown passes and steadying Cincinnati’s offense in a 24-10 victory over No. 24 South Florida in Cincinnati.
snippet: Playing with a soft cast protecting his broken left forearm, the junior Tony Pike had one of his finest games, throwing two touchdown passes and steadying Cincinnati’s offense in a 24-10 victory over No. 24 South Florida in Cincinnati.
